imp.core.structures

Class JointVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.observer.AbstractSubject
      • imp.core.structures.JointVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject

    public class JointVariable
extends AbstractSubject
    Represents a joint variable for a joint. This contains movement information for a particular joint.
    Version:
    1.11
    Author:
    edmissonj

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JointVariable(double mag)
      Creates a new joint variable with the specified magnitude.
